channel.title: Runserver.bat wont work
channel.description:
well here it is @echo off title Project Insanity java -Xmx800m -cp bin;deps/poi.jar;deps/mysql.jar;deps/mina.jar;deps/slf4j.jar;deps/slf4j-nop.jar;deps/jython.jar;log4j-1.2.15.jar; server.Server pause
fix i will love uuuu it shows this [img]http://gyazo.com/43fe61b87342b28d3866388fd5ad49ed.png[/img]

item.title: Runserver.bat wont work
item.dc:creator: @Scape-JAVA Scape-JAVA
item.description:
@Scape-JAVA wrote:

@echo off title Project Insanity java -Xmx512m -cp bin;deps/poi.jar;deps/mysql.jar;deps/mina.jar;deps/slf4j.jar;deps/slf4j-nop.jar;deps/jython.jar;log4j-1.2.15.jar; server.Server pause

-Xmx800m

Using -Xmx800m, is (I believe) using 800 mbs of ram for the server to run.

Change it to a lower number, like -Xmx512m or -Xmx215m Using, 512 mb of ram, or 215 mbs of ram.

Read full topic

item.title: Runserver.bat wont work

item.description:

well here it is

title Project Insanity
java -Xmx800m -cp bin;deps/poi.jar;deps/mysql.jar;deps/mina.jar;deps/slf4j.jar;deps/slf4j-nop.jar;deps/jython.jar;log4j-1.2.15.jar; server.Server
pause

it shows this
